import React from 'react'; import { GSU } from '../constants/colors'; function ScreenChat({ onOpenVoice, onGoToFiles }) { return (

onGoToFiles('resources')} style={{ background: "var(--card)", borderRadius: 16, padding: 20, border: "1px solid var(--line)", cursor: "pointer", transition: "all 0.2s ease" }} onMouseEnter={(e) => { e.target.style.transform = "translateY(-2px)"; e.target.style.boxShadow = "0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)"; }} onMouseLeave={(e) => { e.target.style.transform = "translateY(0)"; e.target.style.boxShadow = "none"; }} >
